Package model

Class Appointments

java.lang.Object
model.Appointments
public class Appointments extends Object
Each appointment record retrieved from the database (in other words, each record retrieved from the database's Appointments table) will be housed in an object of this class.

  • Field Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    private String
    appointmentDescription
    The description of the appointment.
    private String
    appointmentEndDate
    The date that the appointment ends on (in the format YYYY-MM-DD).
    private String
    appointmentEndDateAndTimeInDMYand24HourTime
    The date and time that the appointment ends, in the format DD/MM/YY (with leading zeros used if the day or month value is a single digit) and 24-hour time (in the format HH:MM).
    private String
    appointmentEndDateAndTimeInMDYand12HourTime
    The date and time that the appointment ends, in the format MM/DD/YY (with any leading zeros in the month and day value removed) and 12-hour time (in the format HH:MM, along with AM or PM).
    private String
    appointmentEndTime
    The time that the appointment ends, in the format HH:MM:SS.ns (this is 24-hour time; "ns" stands for "nanoseconds").

    private String
    appointmentTimeRange
    The start time and end time of the appointment (in 24-hour time, with the format HH:MM) with a dash between the start time and end time (so as to signify a range).

  • Field Details

    • appointmentID

      private int appointmentID
      The ID of the appointment.

    • appointmentName

      private String appointmentName
      The title of the appointment.

    • appointmentDescription

      private String appointmentDescription
      The description of the appointment.

    • appointmentLocation

      private String appointmentLocation
      The location where the appointment will take place.

    • appointmentType

      private String appointmentType
      The appointment's type.

    • appointmentStartDate

      private String appointmentStartDate
      The date that the appointment starts on (in the format YYYY-MM-DD). The date in this variable will ALWAYS have exactly that many characters.

    • appointmentStartDateInMDY

      private String appointmentStartDateInMDY
      The date that the appointment starts on, in the format MM/DD/YYYY (with any leading zeros in the month and day value removed).

    • appointmentStartDateInDMY

      private String appointmentStartDateInDMY
      The date that the appointment starts on, in the format DD/MM/YYYY (with leading zeros used if the day or month value is a single digit).

    • appointmentEndDate

      private String appointmentEndDate
      The date that the appointment ends on (in the format YYYY-MM-DD). The date in this variable will ALWAYS have exactly that many characters.

    • appointmentStartTime

      private String appointmentStartTime
      The time that the appointment starts, in the format HH:MM:SS.ns (this is 24-hour time; "ns" stands for "nanoseconds").

    • appointmentEndTime

      private String appointmentEndTime
      The time that the appointment ends, in the format HH:MM:SS.ns (this is 24-hour time; "ns" stands for "nanoseconds").

    • appointmentStartDateAndTimeInMDYand12HourTime

      private String appointmentStartDateAndTimeInMDYand12HourTime
      The date and time that the appointment starts, in the format MM/DD/YY (with any leading zeros in the month and day value removed) and 12-hour time (in the format HH:MM, along with AM or PM). This is used for the Appointments Table when the application is presented in English.

    • appointmentEndDateAndTimeInMDYand12HourTime

      private String appointmentEndDateAndTimeInMDYand12HourTime
      The date and time that the appointment ends, in the format MM/DD/YY (with any leading zeros in the month and day value removed) and 12-hour time (in the format HH:MM, along with AM or PM). This is used for the Appointments Table when the application is presented in English.

    • appointmentStartDateAndTimeInDMYand24HourTime

      private String appointmentStartDateAndTimeInDMYand24HourTime
      The date and time that the appointment starts, in the format DD/MM/YY (with leading zeros used if the day or month value is a single digit) and 24-hour time (in the format HH:MM). This is used for the Appointments Table when the application is presented in French.

    • appointmentEndDateAndTimeInDMYand24HourTime

      private String appointmentEndDateAndTimeInDMYand24HourTime
      The date and time that the appointment ends, in the format DD/MM/YY (with leading zeros used if the day or month value is a single digit) and 24-hour time (in the format HH:MM). This is used for the Appointments Table when the application is presented in French.

    • appointmentTimeRange

      private String appointmentTimeRange
      The start time and end time of the appointment (in 24-hour time, with the format HH:MM) with a dash between the start time and end time (so as to signify a range).

    • idOfCustomerInvolved

      private int idOfCustomerInvolved
      The Customer ID of the customer that is involved in this appointment.

    • nameOfCustomerInvolved

      private String nameOfCustomerInvolved
      The full name of the customer that is involved in this appointment.

    • idOfUserInCharge

      private int idOfUserInCharge
      The User ID of the user that is in charge of this appointment.

    • usernameOfUserInCharge

      private String usernameOfUserInCharge
      The username of the user that is in charge of this appointment.

    • idOfContactInvolved

      private int idOfContactInvolved
      The Contact ID of the contact that is involved in this appointment.

    • nameOfContactInvolved

      private String nameOfContactInvolved
      The full name of the contact that is involved in this appointment.

  • Constructor Details

    • Appointments

      public Appointments(int appointmentID, String appointmentName, String appointmentDescription, String appointmentLocation, String appointmentType, String appointmentStartDate, String appointmentEndDate, String appointmentStartTime, String appointmentEndTime, int idOfCustomerInvolved, String nameOfCustomerInvolved, int idOfUserInCharge, String usernameOfUserInCharge, int idOfContactInvolved, String nameOfContactInvolved)
      This is the constructor for the Appointments class; upon the creation of an Appointment object, this method sets the variables (fields) of that Appointment object to be equal to the given parameters. It also uses the parameter values to calculate the values of certain variables in the Appointment object.
      Parameters:
      appointmentID - The ID of the new appointment
      appointmentName - The title of the new appointment
      appointmentDescription - The description of the new appointment
      appointmentLocation - The location of the new appointment
      appointmentType - The type for the new appointment
      appointmentStartDate - The start date of the new appointment (in YYYY-MM-DD format)
      appointmentEndDate - The end date of the new appointment (in YYYY-MM-DD format)
      appointmentStartTime - The start time of the new appointment in 24-hour time (in the format HH:MM:SS.ns ; "ns" stands for "nanoseconds")
      appointmentEndTime - The end time of the new appointment in 24-hour time (in the format HH:MM:SS.ns ; "ns" stands for "nanoseconds")
      idOfCustomerInvolved - The customer ID of the customer that is involved in this new appointment
      nameOfCustomerInvolved - The full name of the customer that is involved in this new appointment
      idOfUserInCharge - The user ID of the user that is in charge of this new appointment
      usernameOfUserInCharge - The username of the user that is in charge of this new appointment
      idOfContactInvolved - The contact ID of the contact that is involved in this new appointment
      nameOfContactInvolved - The full name of the contact that is involved in this new appointment

  • Method Details

    • getAppointmentID

      public int getAppointmentID()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "appointmentID" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the appointment ID of the current appointment

    • getAppointmentName

      public String getAppointmentName()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "appointmentName" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the full name of this appointment

    • getAppointmentDescription

      public String getAppointmentDescription()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "appointmentDescription" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the description of this appointment

    • getAppointmentLocation

      public String getAppointmentLocation()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "appointmentLocation" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the location of this appointment

    • getAppointmentType

      public String getAppointmentType()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "appointmentType" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the type of this appointment

    • getAppointmentStartDate

      public String getAppointmentStartDate()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "appointmentStartDate" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the start date of the appointment (in the format YYYY-MM-DD). The date returned will ALWAYS have exactly that many characters (because this date value comes straight from the database).

    • getAppointmentStartDateInMDY

      public String getAppointmentStartDateInMDY()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "appointmentStartDateInMDY" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the start date of the appointment in the format MM/DD/YYYY (with any leading zeros for the month and day values removed).

    • getAppointmentStartDateInDMY

      public String getAppointmentStartDateInDMY()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "appointmentStartDateInDMY" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the start date of the appointment in the format DD/MM/YYYY (with leading zeros used if the day or month value is a single digit).

    • getAppointmentEndDate

      public String getAppointmentEndDate()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "appointmentEndDate" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the end date of the appointment (in the format YYYY-MM-DD). The date returned will ALWAYS have exactly that many characters because this date value comes straight from the database).

    • getAppointmentStartTime

      public String getAppointmentStartTime()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "appointmentStartTime" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the start time of this appointment in 24-hour time (in the format HH:MM:SS.ns ; "ns" stands for "nanoseconds")

    • getAppointmentEndTime

      public String getAppointmentEndTime()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "appointmentEndTime" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the end time of this appointment in 24-hour time (in the format HH:MM:SS.ns ; "ns" stands for "nanoseconds")

    • getAppointmentStartDateAndTimeInMDYand12HourTime

      public String getAppointmentStartDateAndTimeInMDYand12HourTime()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "appointmentStartDateAndTimeInMDYand12HourTime" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the date and time that the appointment starts, in the format MM/DD/YY (with any leading zeros in the month and day value removed) and 12-hour time (in the format HH:MM, along with AM or PM). This is used for the Appointments Table when the application is presented in English.

    • getAppointmentEndDateAndTimeInMDYand12HourTime

      public String getAppointmentEndDateAndTimeInMDYand12HourTime()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "appointmentEndDateAndTimeInMDYand12HourTime" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the date and time that the appointment ends, in the format MM/DD/YY (with any leading zeros in the month and day value removed) and 12-hour time (in the format HH:MM, along with AM or PM). This is used for the Appointments Table when the application is presented in English.

    • getAppointmentStartDateAndTimeInDMYand24HourTime

      public String getAppointmentStartDateAndTimeInDMYand24HourTime()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "appointmentStartDateAndTimeInDMYand24HourTime" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the date and time that the appointment starts, in the format DD/MM/YY (with leading zeros used if the day or month value is a single digit) and 24-hour time (in the format HH:MM). This is used for the Appointments Table when the application is presented in French.

    • getAppointmentEndDateAndTimeInDMYand24HourTime

      public String getAppointmentEndDateAndTimeInDMYand24HourTime()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "appointmentEndDateAndTimeInDMYand24HourTime" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the date and time that the appointment ends, in the format DD/MM/YY (with leading zeros used if the day or month value is a single digit) and 24-hour time (in the format HH:MM). This is used for the Appointments Table when the application is presented in French.

    • getAppointmentTimeRange

      public String getAppointmentTimeRange()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "appointmentTimeRange" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the start time and end time of the appointment (in 24-hour time, with the format HH:MM) with a dash between the start time and end time so as to signify a range).

    • getIdOfCustomerInvolved

      public int getIdOfCustomerInvolved()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "idOfCustomerInvolved" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the customer ID of the customer involved in this appointment

    • getNameOfCustomerInvolved

      public String getNameOfCustomerInvolved()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "nameOfCustomerInvolved" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the full name of the customer involved in this appointment

    • getIdOfUserInCharge

      public int getIdOfUserInCharge()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "idOfUserInCharge" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the user ID of the user in charge of this appointment

    • getUsernameOfUserInCharge

      public String getUsernameOfUserInCharge()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "usernameOfUserInCharge" variable of this class.
      Returns:
      Returns the username of the user in charge of this appointment

      public int getIdOfContactInvolved()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "idOfContactInvolved" variable of this class.

    • getNameOfContactInvolved

      public String getNameOfContactInvolved()
      The accessor (getter) method for the "nameOfContactInvolved" variable of this class.
      Returns:
